argument.description: Specifies an SQL character string constant that is interpreted as an XQuery expression using supported XQuery language syntax.
Specifies input values and the manner in which these values are passed to the XQuery expression specified by xquery-expression-constant.
Specifies that the default passing mechanism is by reference for any xquery-variable-expression of data type XML and for the returned value.
Specifies an argument that is to be passed to the XQuery expression specified by xquery-expression-constant.
Specifies an argument that is to be passed to the XQuery expression specified by xquery-expression-constant.
Specifies an argument that is to be passed to the XQuery expression specified by xquery-expression-constant.

description: The XMLQUERY function returns an XML value from the evaluation of an XQuery expression possibly using specified input arguments as XQuery variables.
